title: How much does it cost to hire a graphic designer?
body: The cost of hiring a graphic designer can be anywhere between $1500 to $5000 a month.

title: What are the benefits of hiring a graphic designer from NXG?
body: The benefits of hiring a graphic designer are you can save upto 50% on salaries, flexible hiring models, zero recruitment costs and no pre-hiring or post-hiring responsibilities to manage. Our talent curators take over the legwork and give you freedom from the tedious hiring process.

title: Will the hired graphic designer work during my business hours?
body: Working with teams during your local hours is possible. However, a 5% extra charge exists for the Australia and US region (4 hours overlap with IST timezone) and a 10% additional charge for the Australia and US region (8 hours overlap with IST timezone).

title: How do I hire a dedicated graphic designer from NXG?
body: To hire a graphic designer from NXG, you have to share your requirements post, and we will shortlist a few top matching candidates for you. You interview them and select the ones you find most suitable.

title: How long will it take to hire a graphic designer from NXG?
body: It could take anywhere between 2 to 4 weeks to hire and onboard a graphic designer from NXG.
